recipes.title: Triplo Bacon Burger
recipes.author: Jorge Relato
preparation: Gather the ingredients.
Combine ground beef, onion, bacon, Worcestershire sauce, breadcrumbs, egg, salt, and pepper. Mix with hands until blended.
Shape the ground beef mixture into 4 to 6 burgers and dust them lightly with the flour.
Heat 2 tablespoons of vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Cook the burgers for 7 to 10 minutes on each side, or until cooked to desired doneness.
recipes.information:
According to the USDA, the minimum safe temperature for ground meat—beef, lamb, pork—is 160 F. Cook ground poultry to at least 165 F. 

 Did you know that the recipe that precedes the hamburger appeared in the 13th century, in Europe? The idea of ​​grinding the meat arrived in Hamburg in the 17th century, where a butcher also decided to season it. Thus, the recipe was disseminated in the United States by Germans in the region. There came the idea to put the hamburger in the middle of the bread and add other ingredients, like cheese, tomatoes and lettuce.

recipes.title: Pizza 4 Seasons
recipes.author: Fabiana Melo
preparation: In a blender, beat the milk, egg, salt, sugar, butter, flour and baking powder until everything is well mixed.
Pour the dough into a pizza pan. Grease the pan with butter and bake in the preheated oven for 20 minutes.
Remove from the oven and pour the tomato sauce.
Cover the pasta with grated mozzarella, tomato and oregano to taste.
Bake again until the mozzarella melts.
recipes.information: Blender pizza is a delicious and super simple recipe to prepare. Made entirely in a blender, it is very practical for everyday use. Here at Foodfy, you will also find many practical delights made in a blender: pancake batter, blender chicken pie, blender cheese bread, banana cake, chocolate cake and more!

recipes.title: Barbecue Chicken Wings
recipes.author: Vania Steroski
preparation: In a bowl, place the chicken wings, pass the flour and mix with your hands.
In a frying pan or roaster, add the oil when it is hot and fry until golden brown.
To serve, look good with salad, or show your creativity.

recipes.title: Lasanha Mac n' Cheese
recipes.author: Juliano Vieira
preparation: In a pan, put the butter to melt.
Add the wheat flour and mix well using a mixer.
Add the milk and mix until it forms a homogeneous cream.
Season with salt, pepper and nutmeg to taste.
Turn off the heat and add the cream; mix well and set aside.
recipes.information: Fill the lasagna with whatever you prefer.

recipes.title: Spaghetti with Garlic
recipes.author: Julia Kinoto
ingredients: 1 packet of pasta 500 g (type of pasta to taste)
1 tablespoon of extra virgin olive oil
herbs (basil, oregano, parsley, chives, thyme, to taste)
preparation: When the pasta is about 5 minutes left to be ready, start preparing the recipe.
In the hot skillet, place the butter, oil, bay leaf and granulated garlic.
The drained pasta goes to the pan, being stirred and dosed with salt to taste, the herbs, the powdered ginger to taste as well.
The garlic clove is used to grease the dishes where the pasta will be served.
Put the portions on the dishes already smelling of garlic, and garnish with some herbs.
recipes.information: Do not wash the pasta or oil or grease it after draining it. Put it right in the pan.

recipes.title: Special Sweet
recipes.author: Ricardo Golvea
ingredients: 3 tablespoons of sugar 1 can of Milk Girl
preparation: Cook the sweet potato in a pressure cooker, with half a liter of water, for about 20 minutes. Peel and pass through the juicer, still hot.
Add the butter, eggs, desiccated coconut, sugar, condensed milk and baking powder, stirring well after each addition.
Pour into a greased, medium rectangular baking dish and place in a medium oven (180 ° C) for approximately 45 minutes.
After cold, sprinkle, pass the icing sugar and cut into squares.
